parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Conversations

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unregister conversation topic from given person. See [[Conversations]] for more details.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbRemoveTopic]] topicName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> topicName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit1 [[kbRemoveTopic]] "howsTheWeather";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbAddTopic]], [[kbHasTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbReact]], [[kbAddDatabase]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
